problem_text:
Let P be a presentation of a finite group G on mp generators and rp relations. The deficiency def(G) is the maximum of mp − rp over all presentations P. Let G be a finite group such that G = G′ ≠ 1 and the multiplicator M(G) = 1. Prove that def(Gn) → −∞ as n → ∞, where Gn is the nth direct power of G.
J. Wiegold
